body:
> - Regeneration takes WAY too long for the AI to use at times

Regen using the same timing as Pump activated ability. Do you see the same issue with pump abilities?

Yes. And both abilities are activated at inappropriate as well as appropriate times. Sometimes the AI will not activate them when it would clearly make sense to, like not activating regen when it could and just letting a creature get killed. I tested a deck with Narstad Scrappers and the computer activated its pump just like it does with Odious Trow's regen. During its second main phase (when activating these abilities would be generally pointless), in response to unrelated spells on the stack, etc. And every time it takes forever to activate.
